item.title: By: Renee
item.dc:creator: Renee
item.description: They are so beautiful Anita. I can imagine how lovely they would have been to arrive home to each night. BTW - how exciting to be getting a granite benchtop! Renee x
item.content:encoded: They are so beautiful Anita. I can imagine how lovely they would have been to arrive home to each night. BTW – how exciting to be getting a granite benchtop! Renee x

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description: They are stunning, Anita! Sensational photos too, esp. the one with the admiring bee :o)
item.content:encoded: They are stunning, Anita! Sensational photos too, esp. the one with the admiring bee :o)

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: Your tulips are gorgeous! I do love freesias for their smell though, so it's sad to hear they got eaten up.
item.content:encoded: Your tulips are gorgeous! I do love freesias for their smell though, so it’s sad to hear they got eaten up.

item.title: By: Jenni
item.dc:creator: Jenni
item.description: Beautiful! Tulips are my all time favorite flower! Two years ago I found an awesome sale for 10 cents a bulbs, and I filled our yard! Now that we have moved to an apartment, I am going to really miss them in the spring! I think I heard somewhere that blood meal helps to keep the critters away from your bulbs, and helps to fertilize them. Might want to look into it!
item.content:encoded: Beautiful! Tulips are my all time favorite flower! Two years ago I found an awesome sale for 10 cents a bulbs, and I filled our yard! Now that we have moved to an apartment, I am going to really miss them in the spring! I think I heard somewhere that blood meal helps to keep the critters away from your bulbs, and helps to fertilize them. Might want to look into it!
